content: Water collector system ring WCS 10 ### Categories: Home > Products > Dust and water management > Self-attaching water collectors- - - ### FEATURES:Features No need for additional holders to fix the water collector to the wall Catches up to 80% of slurry Applications Keep the jobsite clean with the WMS 100 water management system Multiple collection rings available based on core bit diameter ### TECHNICAL DATA: Accessory type: Water collector systems Product information: Water collector system up to Ø 250 mm For use with: DD 250, DD 250-CA, DD 350-CA, DD 500-CA Technical Data | Accessory type | Water collector systems | Product information | Water collector system up to Ø 250 mm | For use with | DD 250, DD 250-CA, DD 350-CA, DD 500-CA | Additional Accessory Information | Water collector system up to Ø 250 mm ### ITEMS- 2159814 - Water collector system ring WCS 10 - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x DD-WCS-250 Water collector sys assy
